channel.title: Readify on Raph's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Readify on Raph's Blog

item.title: Leaving CSB Engage :(
item.description: What a journey it has been! Whether it be developing SIG using the Facebook and Instagram APIs or managing huge data sets (close to 1 billion). CSB Engage has been a wonderful place to work. It had flexibility and a great culture. The best thing would probably be the Monday lunches. This is where one person from the team would bring lunch from home and we would eat together. I’m proud that I’ve seen CSB Engage grow from Endless Rewards, to its merger with OnitMedia and I’ve been there every step of the way.
